body:
Comment 3: 
Typeof on a pointer is well-defined.

The confusion is that PkgPath and Name only work on
named types.  If you'd like to print the full type syntax,
the String() method will do that.

I will point out in the documentation the PkgPath and Name
only work on named types.
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Started**._
